title: Many duas in Fortress Of The Muslim, which ones protect us from Evil eye Black magic Assim al hakeem
transcript: she my question is as Huda TV is broadcasting the program Forest of the Muslim may Allah reward you for that as there are many to recite so my question is can you please highlight the Nam of the dasas only that I should protection from the and black mag only highlight this is a little bit difficult because no one can pinpoint exactly what will protect you from evil eye or black magic or Jin as this is a package deal the minimum we do is the last three and these are the crown of all duas of protection and then there is the Dua to the rest so these are highly uh um graded duas but the more you do the more you're protected and there isn't one single Dua that would suffice otherwise what's the need of the others so you try your level best to memorize them all to dedicate 15 to 20 minutes after F prayer and M prayer or ass prayer depending for your AAR and say it and inshallah you'll be fine
